author: PSGvili
body:
<!--

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------
install printer driver that his MajorVersion is 4
for example Samsung M332x 382x 402x Series Class Driver
run remove-CimInstance -Query "Select * from win32_printerdriver where name LIKE 'Samsung M332x 382x 402x Series Class Driver%'"

Expected behavior
-----------------
The selected printer driver need to be remove(deleted) from the installed printer drivers

Actual behavior
---------------
The selected printer driver wont deleted

I try the following tests:
Passed.
Get-PrinterDriver -Name Samsung M332x 382x 402x Series Class Driver' | Remove-CimInstance

Passed.
Get-PrinterDriver -Name Samsung M332x 382x 402x Series Class Driver' | Remove-PrinterDriver

Failed.
Get-CimInstance -Query "Select * from win32_printerdriver where name LIKE 'Samsung M332x 382x 402x Series Class Driver%'" | Remove-CimInstance
- No Error

Failed.
Remove-CimInstance -Query "Select * from win32_printerdriver where name LIKE 'Samsung M332x 382x 402x Series Class Driver%'"
- No Error

Failed.
Remove-CimInstance -InputObject ((Get-CimInstance -ClassName win32_printerdriver)[0])
- No Error

Failed.
$t = (Get-CimInstance -ClassName win32_printerdriver)[0]
Remove-CimInstance -InputObject $t
- No Error

Failed.
(Get-CimInstance -ClassName win32_printerdriver)[0] | Remove-PrinterDriver
- Error
Remove-PrinterDriver : No MSFT_PrinterDriver objects found with property 'Name' equal to 'RICOH Class Driver,4,Windows x64'.  Verify the value of the property and retry.

----------------

title: Remove-CimInstance wont work with Win32_PrinterDriver that the Driver MajorVersion is 4
